description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Chile vs Haiti in the Friendlies Women
title: Chile vs Haiti: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head
title_page: Chile vs Haiti: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt blocked. Yastin Jiménez (Chile) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Nayadet López.
Post
Attempt missed. Pamela Cabezas (Chile) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Yenny Acuña with a cross.
Post
Attempt saved. Melchie Dumornay (Haiti) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Déborah Bien-Aimé with a through ball.
Post
Yenny Acuña (Chile) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the right side of the box. Assisted by Karen Araya.
Post
Fourth official has announced 7 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Yenny Acuña (Chile) left footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left.
Post
Attempt blocked. Karen Araya (Chile) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Post
Attempt missed. Sherly Jeudy (Haiti) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right.
